name: Henley & Partners Holdings Ltd
goal: The Henley & Partners group of companies (‘H&P’) specialises in the residence-by-investment and citizenship-by-investment sector (‘sector’). H&P’s clients are wealthy individuals who wish to take advantage of government programs in which Henley & Partners have particular expertise. The subsidiary dealing with H&P’s relationships with jurisdictions is Henley & Partners Government Services Ltd (‘HPGS’).
interests: Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Citizenship and Immigration policies of the EU and their application in the Member States.
